body_html:
I have the same problem now, but from within jupyter notebook. It works in ipython and python3. I installed from instructions at the homepage

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl 
pip install torchvision

All interpreters tested were installed within a virtual environment

*** Error in `/<some-path>/venv/bin/python3': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007f7986d64b80 ***

body:
I have the same problem now, but from within jupyter notebook. It works in ipython and python3. I installed from instructions at the homepage

```
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp35-cp35m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl 
pip install torchvision
```
All interpreters tested were installed within a virtual environment
```
*** Error in `/<some-path>/venv/bin/python3': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007f7986d64b80 ***
```
